Class Grouped

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.models.Grouped
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Geometric
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ground, Roof, Wall

    public abstract class Grouped
extends java.lang.Object
implements Geometric
    An abstract class for all elements that use an inner Group (walls, grounds, ...)
    Author:
    Titouan Christophe
